Game.Name: Gradius Advance (Europe)
Game.plot: The classic franchise Gradius comes to Game Boy® Advance! An evil force has taken over a distant star system and only you can stop them. Soar through a myriad of enemy attack units and blow them to bits using ultra powerful weapons including photon missiles and laser beams.Cheat: All WeaponsWhile in play, pause the game and enter the following code : Up, Up, Down, Down, L, R, L, R, B, ACheat: All WeaponsTo delete saved data, go to the options screen, select ''EXIT'', and then hold the L, R and B buttons, then press start.Cheat: All WeaponsPause the game and enter the following:Cheat: All WeaponsTo get one speed-up and full power-up of laser, options, and shield; pause and enter: Up, Up, Down, Down, L, R, L, R, B, A, Start This code works only once per game, including all continues. To momentarily get the power-ups listed above, and then self-destruct, pause and enter: Up, Up, Down, Down, Left, Right, Left, Right, B, A, Start This code may be used as often as you like.Cheat: Unlocking Challenge ATo unlock ''Challenge A'' just clear the game once. Then it can be selected from the main menu.Cheat: Unlocking Challenge ATo unlock Challenge B a harder version of Challenge A, you have to clear Challenge A.Cheat: Gradius one music from NES Start a new mission on stage 1 of Gradius Galaxies. Somewhere in the stage, there are 2 strips of horizontal rocks (one longer than the other). Carefully travel through the small gap in between the 2 rocks and you'll get 5000 extra points. Complete the game as normal and when you return to stage 1 again on the next loop, the stage music will change to Gradius one from NES.
